text: Jean-Claude Duvalier (), nicknamed "Bébé Doc" or "Baby Doc" (July 3, 1951 – October 4, 2014) was the President of Haiti from 1971 until his overthrow by a popular uprising in 1986. He succeeded François "Papa Doc" Duvalier, his father, as the ruler of Haiti. Duvalier died of a heart attack on October 4, 2014, at the age of 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Former dictators Category:Presidents of Haiti
title: Jean-Claude Duvalier
